mapper.select: select a.bookcode, to_char(a.checkin,'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkin, to_char(a.checkout, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as checkout, a.mobile, a.name, a.price, a.pcount, a.roomcode, b.name roomname, c.name typename from booking a, room b, roomtype c where a.roomcode = b.roomcode and b.type=c.typecode and b.type=#{param3} and a.checkin between #{param1} and #{param2} and a.checkout between #{param1} and #{param2}
